Title: Cloud+ Architecture & Design Principles
Cert Exam Objective: CompTIA Cloud+ CV0-003: 1.1 - Compare and contrast the different types of cloud models
Main Topics: Cloud architecture types, service deployment, elasticity, availability

Title: AWS IAM Advanced: Roles & Federation
Cert Exam Objective: AWS CCP: Understand the AWS shared responsibility model and IAM concepts
Main Topics: IAM roles, federated access, MFA, policy writing
Tools Used: AWS Console, IAM, JSON Policy Editor, Obsidian, GitHub

Title: Azure AD & Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
Cert Exam Objective: AZ-900: Describe identity, governance, privacy, and compliance features
Main Topics: Azure Active Directory, RBAC, role assignments, permissions

Title: GCP IAM & Service Accounts
Cert Exam Objective: Google ACE: Set IAM policies at the project, folder, and organization level
Main Topics: Service accounts, scopes, IAM binding with gcloud CLI
Tools Used: GCP Console, gcloud CLI, Obsidian, GitHub

Title: Linux+: Users, Groups, and Permissions
Cert Exam Objective: CompTIA Linux+ XK0-005: 1.2 - Manage users and groups

Title: AWS Storage: EBS, S3, Glacier
Cert Exam Objective: AWS CCP: Identify AWS storage services and use cases
Main Topics: Block vs object storage, S3 lifecycle, EBS snapshots, Glacier vaults
Tools Used: AWS Console, EC2, S3, Obsidian, GitHub

Title: Azure Storage: Blob, File, Disk
Cert Exam Objective: AZ-900: Describe core Azure services including storage
Main Topics: Blob tiers, access levels, managed disks, storage account configuration
Tools Used: Azure Portal, Azure CLI, Obsidian, GitHub
